channel.title: Borderlands Quest glitch and willow tree crashing
channel.description:
Ok, so I have a 52 siren on borderlands, and ive been playing playthrough 2. Now, the problem is that i cant complete the mission "Keep your insides inside" (which is where you need to buy a shield, and turn it into the doc), and thus, cannot continue the game.
I was told to use willow tree to manually "finish" the quest, however, when i try opening my siren save, willowtree crashes. I've tried willow tree on a lvl 1 soldier, and that seems to work fine.
Any help? Oh, and btw, im playing borderlands on my steam account.
UPDATE: I just learned that if i try and go into the weapons workshop, that the save opens fine, and willowtree doesn't crash.

item.title: Borderlands Quest glitch and willow tree crashing
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
Siggs:

Unless it’s a really common issue, I doubt anyone here can help. I for one get a glitch where I have to find separate rifle parts. I have all but the last part…which doesn’t exist where the marker says it does That quest is just stuck on my list then…

Bollocks, it just a bitch to find and the marker doesn’t locate it’s where abouts.

try a youtube video guide.

Read full topic
item.source: Borderlands Quest glitch and willow tree crashing

item.title: Borderlands Quest glitch and willow tree crashing
item.dc:creator: Maverix26
item.description:
Ok, so I have a 52 siren on borderlands, and ive been playing playthrough 2.
Now, the problem is that i cant complete the mission “Keep your insides inside” (which is where you need to buy a shield, and turn it into the doc), and thus, cannot continue the game.

I was told to use willow tree to manually “finish” the quest, however, when i try opening my siren save, willowtree crashes. I’ve tried willow tree on a lvl 1 soldier, and that seems to work fine.

Any help?
Oh, and btw, im playing borderlands on my steam account.

UPDATE: I just learned that if i try and go into the weapons workshop, that the save opens fine, and willowtree doesn’t crash.
